title: Into the Mist
description: Embark on a mysterious journey through an atmospheric, fog-laden world filled with hidden secrets. Unravel the enigma of this otherworldly landscape as you explore its depths and uncover long-lost truths shrouded in mist.

episodes.title: Mists of Ravenloft
episodes.description: Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling and Rone are transported to Barovia by the mists of Ravenloft, where they must navigate the land's dangers.

episodes.title: Welcome to Barovia
episodes.description: Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling and Rone arrive in the village of Barovia, meeting a Vistani named Orel. They soon help children with an issue in their basement.

episodes.title: Haunted Mansion
episodes.description: A group of friends discovers a haunted mansion inhabited by malevolent spirits.

episodes.title: Hope
episodes.description: The group navigates the dangerous catacombs, facing unknown threats as they delve deeper into Death House's secrets.

episodes.title: One Must Die
episodes.description: The protagonists confront Gustav and Elisabeth Durst in a tense showdown, revisiting their past encounters.

episodes.title: The Decayer Awaketh
episodes.description: In this sixth episode of 'Into the Mist', Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling and Rone confront Lorgoth the Decayer as they attempt to escape from the Death House.

episodes.title: Unanswered Prayers
episodes.description: Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling and Rone investigate Father Donavich's mysterious past during a visit to the village church.

episodes.title: Fortunes of Ravenloft
episodes.description: Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling and Rone journey to Vallaki after receiving a reading from Madame Eva in search of answers.

episodes.title: Nevermore
episodes.description: In Episode 9, Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling and Rone seek rest in Vallaki after a long journey.

episodes.title: Lifeblood
episodes.description: Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling and Rone embark on a journey to the Wizard of Wines Winery in this season's finale.

episodes.title: Q&A
episodes.description: A special Q&A edition of 'Into the Mist' where Joel, David, Brandon and Jason answer community questions.

episodes.title: Blighted
episodes.description: Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling and Rone find themselves trapped in the Wizard of Wines Winery.

episodes.title: The Devil Himself
episodes.description: Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling and Rone return to Vallaki for the festival of the Blazing Sun. Special guests Matt Mercer, Matthew Lillard and Noura Ibrahim join in.

episodes.title: The Devil Himself
episodes.description: Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling and Rone confront the devil himself in this thrilling installment of RealmSmith's 'Into the Mist'. Special guests Matthew Lillard and Noura Ibrahim share insights.

episodes.title: Tides of Wildemount
episodes.description: Join RealmSmith's 'Tides of Wildemount' campaign with special guests exploring the epic Prologue adventure.

episodes.title: A Dark Invitation
episodes.description: In the Season Two premiere, a dinner is hosted by Strahd for Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling, Rone and newcomer Muskoka. The episode features special guests Matthew Mercer and Noura Ibrahim.

episodes.title: Old Bonegrinder
episodes.description: Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling, Rone and newcomer Muskoka journey into the mysterious Old Bonegrinder.

episodes.title: Rictavio has Returned!
episodes.description: Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling, and Muskoka journey to the village of Krezk where Rictavio makes a shocking return.

episodes.title: The Bride of Von Zarovich
episodes.description: Welcome to Season 2, Episode 5 of RealmSmith’s 'Into the Mist' where Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling, and Muskoka confront the Abbot of the Abbey of St. Markovia.

episodes.title: Righteous Misconception
episodes.description: Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling and Muskoka navigate moral dilemmas that blur the lines between right and wrong in this Season 2 episode.

episodes.title: Reunited
episodes.description: Callie, Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling, and Muskoka find themselves in a moral quandary over the Morninglord's will as they navigate Season 2 of RealmSmith’s 'Into the Mist'.

episodes.title: Quest For Answers
episodes.description: Dmitri, Falpher, Sterling, Muskoka and Ezmerelda set out on a journey to discover their next steps.

episodes.title: Undead-Ends
episodes.description: Dmitri and Falpher embark on a personal quest in the latest installment of 'Into the Mist'.

episodes.title: Hunted
episodes.description: Welcome to Season 2, Episode 11 of RealmSmith’s 'Into the Mist' where Sterling, Muskoka, Dmitri, Ezmerelda and Falpher fight of a pack of Werewolves bent on killing Ezmerelda.

episodes.title: Muskoka, Dmitri and Falpher journey to wizard's tower
episodes.description: Sterling, Muskoka, Dmitri and Falpher search for the mysterious Mad Mage of Baratok in a dilapidated wizard's tower.

episodes.title: Memories in the Mist
episodes.description: Welcome to Season 2, Episode 12 of RealmSmith’s 'Into the Mist' where Sterling, Muskoka, Dmitri, Ezmerelda and Falpher head to Yester Hill to deal with an impending threat!

episodes.title: Worthy Sacrifice
episodes.description: Sterling, Muskoka, Dmitri, Ezmerelda and Falpher plan to interrupt a sinister ritual on Yester Hill.

episodes.title: Wintersplinter
episodes.description: In this thrilling season finale, Sterling and Dmitri must stop a malevolent force from destroying Muskoka. Ezmerelda and Falpher join the fight to save their friend.

episodes.title: All Hallow's Eve
episodes.description: In this thrilling Season 2 episode, the ragtag crew of Sterling, Dmitri, Ezmerelda, Muskoka and Falpher must confront a powerful life-eater that threatens to consume everything in its path.

episodes.title: The Mad Mage
episodes.description: In the latest installment of 'Into the Mist', Sterling, Dmitri, Ezmerelda, Muskoka and Falpher unite their new allies to confront an ancient evil threatening the realm.
